docs.info: Foreman API v2 is currently the default API version.

examples:
PUT /api/locations/255093256-Location%201
{
  "location": {
    "name": "New Location",
    "ignore_types": [
      "Domain",
      "Hostgroup",
      "Environment",
      "User",
      "Medium",
      "Subnet",
      "SmartProxy",
      "ProvisioningTemplate",
      "ComputeResource",
      "Realm"
    ]
  }
}
200
{
  "ancestry": null,
  "created_at": "2015-12-01T02:40:02Z",
  "description": null,
  "id": 255093256,
  "ignore_types": [
    "Domain",
    "Hostgroup",
    "Environment",
    "User",
    "Medium",
    "Subnet",
    "SmartProxy",
    "ProvisioningTemplate",
    "ComputeResource",
    "Realm"
  ],
  "name": "New Location",
  "title": "New Location",

}
